entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 1 May 2023
